casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina, Plaintiff,
v.
Jermaine D. CARSON, Jr. Defendant. No. 154P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 18, 2017 Jermaine D. Carson, Jr., for Carson, Jermaine Derrick (Jr.). Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 18th of May 2017 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Buncombe County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of May 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
